definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: dub., perhaps cream (as skimmed of ? cf. Wetzst:ZAW iii (1883), 276 f., who connects with Ar. 4ifa0yah;un cream, and this with √4f0 take off the top (but [[שׁ]] = 4 ?); EV cheese (after SyrVer Targum, cf. ARSK:KB 3091)) ;—cstr. [[שְׁפוֹת בָּקָר]] 2Sa 17:29 cream of the herd ( + [[דְּבַשׁ וְחֶמְאָה וְחאׁן]]), cf. Now Bu; LXX. of Lucian HPS calves.
